description: News about Taxi and Limousine Commission, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Taxi and Limousine Commission
title_page: Taxi and Limousine Commission - The New York Times
maintext:
Yellow Cabs Are Struggling. Congestion Pricing Could Deal a New Blow.
The tolling program could push up fares and shrink taxi demand, the M.T.A. says. Cabdrivers are also seeking their own fare hike of up to 23 percent.
